name: bytebuffer
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>
description: A Java-like ByteBuffer implementation using typed arrays.

scripts.make: npm run-script compile && npm run-script noexpose && npm test && npm run-script jsdoc
scripts.compile: java -jar closure-compiler/compiler.jar --create_source_map ByteBuffer.min.map --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js ByteBuffer.js --js_output_file ByteBuffer.min.js
